teamMembers.name: David Packham
teamMembers.title: CEO & Co-Founder
bio: David has a 20yr career in finance and asset management in London, working for a range of global institutions in areas covering FinTech, business strategy and programme management.

David studied economics and business systems analysis and design, and is a decentralist with a passionate belief in the potential of blockchain to change the world by increasing personal freedoms and reducing inequality.
As general project manager of Chintai, he seeks to ensure all facets of the product meet the highest industry standards.

teamMembers.name: Phillip Hamnett
teamMembers.title: CTO
bio: Phillip has 9 years of experience developing software in C++ and embedded C.
He started his career as a physicist working in complexity theory, where he developed Monte Carlo simulations to model traffic flow in cities.
Then he moved on to data analysis for the ATLAS experiment at the Large Hadron Collider, where he searched for new particles at extremely high energies.
After he finished his Ph.D, he moved into the aerospace industry, developing software for Airbus.
Finally, he has joined us and is working full time on the development of the Chintai platform.

teamMembers.name: Ryan Bethem
teamMembers.title: COO
bio: Ryan has a M.A in clinical psychology and a B.S in psychology with an emphasis in behavioral economics.
After discovering the potential impact that blockchain technology could have on global financial systems in 2016, Ryan quickly became an enthusiast and advocate for decentralized technologies.

Ryan eventually transitioned careers in 2017. He quickly became a leader in the development of EOSIO based governance and authored the governing contract for block producers on the EOS mainnet in 2019.
He leads brand development, communications, operations and business development for Chintai.

teamMembers.name: Michael Fletcher
teamMembers.title: Principal Developer
bio: Michael is a core back-end developer with 7 years of experience in the nuclear energy, technology and logistical automation sectors.
He has led the development of systems used by major companies specialising in creating real time, business critical, distributed systems.

teamMembers.name: Andrew Diedrich
teamMembers.title: Full Stack Developer
bio: Andrew has a Bachelors degree in Economics from the University of Minnesota.
The foundation of Andrew’s technical background is based on data driven planning and strategy using econometric methods for retail sales and labor planning.
Five year experience using SQL, R and SAS statistical software for data analysis. Two years of experience with javascript.
Andrew is driven by a passion for the social impact through blockchain technology, which ultimately led him to sharpen his technical skills as a full-stack developer.

teamMembers.name: Kai Jing
teamMembers.title: Head of Operations, China / Full Stack Developer
bio: Kai has a bachelors degree in Light Chemical Industry Engineering from the South China University of Technology, he has extensive experience in manufacturing, e-commerce, Web development, product design and operations.

Kai started his software developer career as a full stack developer 5 years ago, and he is familiar with using MySQL, Ruby on Rails and Javascript for Web development, React is added to his technical stack lately. Kai has also worked as product manager in e-commerce industry.
Kai first learned about bitcoin in 2010. In 2017, he re-recognized the importance of the blockchain industry and became one active communicators.
Kai is good at presenting complex technical information in a clear and concise manner, he wrote more than 200 posts in Chinese on blockchain, especially on the EOSIO project.
Kai is one of the opinion leaders in EOSIO community in China, he has more than 70,000 followers on Chinese most important content website in crypto space - Bihu.

teamMembers.name: Sean Kang
teamMembers.title: Business Development
bio: Sean has more than ten years of experiences in banking, finance, and urban engineering.

He began his career as an account manager with the largest bank in Canada, operated various businesses in Korea and Canada, and lived in the United States. Sean discovered EOS while pursuing his Ph.D. degree in urban planning for the development of smart cities.
He envisions our daily lives being fundamentally influenced by smart cities that leverage scalable blockchain technology.

Combining his abilities as an urban planner to listen, understand, and implement what the community wants with his diverse cultural background enables Sean to deliver comprehensive solutions for the EOS community.

teamMembers.name: Michael Nash
teamMembers.title: Developer
bio: Prior to entering the crypto space, Nash worked in biomedical science research.

Working for the University of Oxford for three years alongside world leading experts in their field, he was responsible for contributing to the production of high quality research with a view to curing neurodegenerative diseases.
Since learning more about Blockchain technology and the EOS ecosystem in 2018, Nash has decided to put his efforts into learning more about this technology, and contribute to it's growth.
He is passionate about the potential for Blockchain technology to radically alter the lives of regular people in the future, giving them the opportunity to be more free to live the life they choose.
As a member of our quality assurance team, Nash is responsible for making sure all our services are functioning correctly - at launch, and beyond.

advisors.name: Tom Bicknell
advisors.title: Advisor
bio: Partner at Pinsent Masons, a leading Financial Technology law firm. Tom is a highly experienced financial service and corporate insurance practitioner based in the Middle East and is actively advising and assisting Chintai with regulatory engagement.

advisors.name: Keith Koo
advisors.title: Advisor
bio: Managing Partner, Guardian Insight Group  /  Host “Silicon Valley Insider” Radio Show and Podcast

Keith is a Founder and Managing Partner of Guardian Insight Group, a Strategic a advisory firm whose clients include Fortune 500 companies and startups. He is also the creator and host of the Silicon Valley Insider Radio Show and Podcast and on the boards of the Asian Business League and Silicon Valley Chinese Technology Business Association.

advisors.name: Matthew Mckibbin
advisors.title: Advisor
bio: Matt is the Co-Founder of Decentranet, a purpose-driven investment and advisory firm specializing in blockchain and transformational technologies with a global impact.
He is the former Co-Founder and Chief Decentralization Officer at d10e, the world’s leading conference on decentralized technologies, philosophies and social organization.
Matt has been a decentralization and transformative tech evangelist since 2013 when he coordinated the DC Blockchain Meetup and was an active, early member BitAngels since 2013.
Matt is a prolific and sought-after speaker as an expert on decentralization and governance at leading conferences worldwide.

He has been featured in dozens of media publications, including Bloomberg, Nasdaq, TechCrunch, CoinDesk, CoinTelegraph, Bitcoin Magazine, and more. Matt received his Bachelor’s of Arts in Physics from West Virginia University.

advisors.name: Ted Moskovitz
advisors.title: Advisor
bio: Ted is a Founding Partner and Advisor at Decentranet. A former Securities and Exchange Commission lawyer turned serial entrepreneur, Ted is an active investor in the blockchain ecosystem, especially in social impact projects.
He is also the Co-Founder of the virtual incubator Featured Labs, which advises and invests in companies working in SaaS, genomic-based medicine, cannabis, and blockchain technology.
A sought-after speaker, Ted has presented at dozens of blockchain industry events, including Blockchain Cruise Asia, CryptoHQ, and Blockchain for Impact.
As an expert in securities law, Ted has consulted with several notable publications, including Tim Pool Cast, BadCrypto, Investing.com and Coin Telegraph.
He graduated magna cum laude with his Juris Doctor in Banking, Corporate, Finance, and Securities Law from American University, Washington College of Law.

advisors.name: Tiffany Madison
advisors.title: Advisor
bio: In 2015, Tiffany created and co-founded d10e, the world’s leading conference on decentralized technologies, philosophies and social organizations. Prior to d10e, she served as the Vice President of Coin Congress, a cryptocurrency-focused event founded by Brock Pierce.
In 2016, she also served as the Director of Communications and Investor Relations at MGT Capital Investments, Inc., a leading Bitcoin mining company.

A former journalist for the Washington Times, Tiffany is an accomplished writer and communications professional. Tiffany also served as a campaign manager for John McAfee during his 2016 Presidential campaign.

Currently, Tiffany also serves as a city leader for Bunker Labs, a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization and national network of leaders and volunteers dedicated to helping veterans, spouses and entrepreneurs start their own business.

advisors.name: Jami Mckibbin
advisors.title: Advisor
bio: Jamie is a former analyst at American Textile Company. While attending the University of Pittsburgh, Jamie began an eight year mission of social change.

He has been active in the Pittsburgh liberty scene, founding and participating in several local organizations. He first took an interest in cryptocurrency in 2012 for its potential to revolutionize many industries and decentralize existing power structures.

Today, he applies his background in economics and data analysis with DecentraNet, providing a unique skillset to the team. Jamie holds a Bachelor’s of Science in Economics from the University of Pittsburgh.

content.p1: Chintai started as a successful exchange for leasing token utility. We’ve evolved into a white-label technology service provider for issuance, secondary trading, and management of tokenized securities.
content.p2: Similar to how a platform like Shopify enables anyone to easily sell products in a custom storefront, Chintai services smart contracts and front-end management portals to rapidly issue compliance enabled digital assets with liquid ready secondary markets.

content.p1: Many decentralized finance instruments are unsuitable for institutional use because public blockchains are too slow, have burdensome fees, or offer no recourse in the event of bugs or exploits. Consequently, logic is put off-chain, resulting in loss of potential efficiency gains.
content.p2: Chintai products are high-performance, compliance enabled, low fee, and enable recourse in the event of bugs or exploits, while maintaining the advantages of blockchain.

team.TeamSubtext: The Chintai team combines expertise in finance, technology, product development, marketing and more to deliver some of the most used decentralized applications in the blockchain industry.

countdown.auctionEnded: The CHEX token distribution has concluded. Thank you for participating.

landingContent.title: Compliance Enabled Blockchain Technology For Institutional Finance & Enterprise
landingContent.subtitle: Chintai is a B2B FinTech service provider for custody, issuance and secondary trading of tokenized securities and other digital assets. Our compliance enabled products dramatically reduce overhead by automating manual middle/back office processes, compliance, corporate actions and more.

keyPonts.detail1: Custom issuance for virtually any asset - real estate, equities, bonds, stablecoins, utility tokens,  and more. Cap table management. KYC/AML with automated accreditation and investor checks. Automated corporate actions.
keyPonts.detail2: The only 100% on-chain high performance engine for trading tokenized securities. Encoded controls ensure automated jurisdictional compliance.
keyPonts.detail3: Custom built and rendered in your website. The benefits of our compliance enabled engine while being obfuscated entirely from your clients and internal operations.

productsData.name: White Label
productsData.title: Issuance, Secondary Trading & Custom Build
productsData.subtitle: Use our plug-and-play technology to unlock instant efficiency gains in finance.
content: The promise of blockchain technology for finance is known, but integrating the technology is very difficult. Our blockchain agnostic product suite easily connects institutional finance, enterprise, and entrepreneurs to the efficiency gains that can be achieved with blockchain technology. We help people focus on product delivery and integration into legacy systems by combining ready to use commercial grade tools and multiple protocols.

Similar to how a platform like Shopify offers the means for anyone to easily sell products in a custom storefront, Chintai provides infrastructure for financial institutions to support custom issuance and trading of securitized assets on ANY blockchain. Chintai operates completely obfuscated from internal or external usage.

Our products for issuance, secondary trading, and management of tokenized securities are compliance enabled. This means jurisdictional law can be automatically enforced and applied. Breaches can be instantaneously detected and responded to in order to stop fraud.

productsData.name: Regulated DEX
productsData.title: Regulatory compliant trading for tokenized securities
productsData.subtitle: The Chintai DEX will be a compliant, full custody, peer-to-peer exchange for trading digital assets, including tokenized securities.
content: The Chintai DEX will serve two purposes - trading utility tokens and security tokens. Our DEX is 100% on-chain and gives users full custody. All compliance controls are baked into the account and token level for full jurisdictional compliance. We are applying for licensure in Singapore (MAS) to be a fully regulated decentralized exchange.

Every aspect of the exchange will meet the regulatory requirements of major regulators and guidelines including, FATF, FCA, FINCEN, etc. Our goal is to expand our services to be chain agnostic and retain licensure across all major jurisdictions so that cryptocurrency investors can have full custody of their assets and trade in a fully compliant peer-to-peer environment.
We are currently offering whitelabel usage of our DEX engine for entities that have already attained licensing and want to conduct issuance and secondary trading of tokenized securities.

productsData.name: Mynt Issuance
productsData.title: Regulatory compliant custom token distributions
productsData.subtitle: Mynt is a turn-key service that harmonizes the technical, legal and financial elements of token distributions.
content: Responsibly launching a token requires trusted technology and resources. My Native Token (Mynt) connects entrepreneurs to our proven technology and resources to launch custom tokens. Our end-to-end service includes custom token contracts, custom distribution portal, legal resources, KYC/AML and more.

Our reputable development team builds your custom token with our proven and reliable technology. Most notably, we make sure your token is harmonized with your legal needs. We build custom front end portals for all distribution types, including auctions, STO’s and any other form. Technology for KYC/AML fully integrated and all major crypto can be accepted.
For more information or questions please contact the Chintai team or visit the Mynt landing page.

productsData.name: Token Leasing
productsData.title: Putting tokens collecting virtual dust to work.
productsData.subtitle: Chintai is the only decentralized high-performance exchange for leasing token utility.
content: Chintai started a token leasing platform. By decoupling token utility from token ownership, robust leasing markets can form that help businesses reduce overhead and activate reward opportunities for token holders. For example, the DAPP token gives owners staking rights to access precious developer tools in the DAPP network. But not everyone who holds DAPP tokens needs to use them.

Chintai allows DAPP token holders to lend their tokens that would otherwise be collecting virtual dust. This allows lenders to generate rewards. While borrowers can access utility at low costs, and avoid locking precious capital that could be used to run and expand their businesses.
We’ve built four token leasing markets and have flexible technology to add more markets as demand for token utility increases. So far we’ve transacted more than $250 million in total volume.

productsData.name: NFTs Leasing
productsData.title: Activating the full potential of virtual item ownership
productsData.subtitle: Chintai will be the first platform that enables leasing of NFTs - bespoke virtual assets.
content: Millions are being poured into NFT (bespoke virtual items) product development. From the Winklvoss twins to Ubisoft, some of the biggest names are getting involved. In anticipation of explosive market growth for NFTs, Chintai will offer the first exchange interface for leasing NFTs and an API for developers to embed leasing directly into their products.

Trading virtual assets within games is estimated to be a $50 billion dollar industry alone and perfectly suited for NFT leasing. Chintai is currently targeting the gaming industry and is actively working in partnership with industry leaders to enable the first protocol for leasing NFTs.
To learn more about the Chintai NFT products please contact our team.

productsData.name: Charm
productsData.title: Automated resource allocation for dApps and users
productsData.subtitle: Blockchain resources power transactions. Management is required. Chintai automates the process.
content: Charm automatically allocates EOSIO resources to dApp contract and user accounts. By having automatic allocation of resources you gain immunity to network congestion — you will never be locked out of an account, or suffer down time. By ensuring up time and resource surplus, you avoid unnecessary risk of losing users and revenue, while giving yourself an important tool to automatically allocate resources to end users. Charm also makes sure you pay the lowest fees possible over time, and uses CHEX to reduce fees on our platform. CHEX reduces fees by 50%

industryData.name: Chintai & CHEX
industryData.subtitle: Putting tokens collecting virtual dust to work.

industryData.name: Finance
industryData.subtitle: Activating the full potential of virtual item ownership
content: Blockchain based efficiency gains can profoundly change global financial systems. The current infrastructure is the equivalent of a fax machine when compared to the “smart phone” that is blockchain technology. The databases on which the world’s financial assets are stored and managed cause massive unnecessary overhead. Manual intervention is needed for everything from reconciliation between financial entities, execution of advanced payments, reporting, and much more.

Chintai technology uses a combination of high-performance cutting edge protocols to help institutional finance easily port their assets to blockchain technology. Making the transition helps significantly decrease overhead that is caused by manual handling of securities and unlocks liquidity in traditionally illiquid markets.

Most everything that requires manual handling in legacy systems can be automated by Chintai - including collateral handling, advanced payments, compliance, and more. And unlike other blockchain service providers, Chintai has a “clawback” mechanism in the case of a hack or mistake, while offering customizable high-performance products for secondary trading, issuance, and management that have virtually no underlying fees.

industryData.name: Real Estate
industryData.subtitle: Globally compliant peer-to-peer trading
content: Real estate is one of the world’s oldest assets and the most reliable method of building wealth. However, the real estate investment market is characterized by two key issues that blockchain technology can solve:
1) Very low liquidity, making it difficult to transfer and sell. Single transfers are manual, costly, and usually takes days.
2) Very high capital requirements, which puts the asset class out of reach for most retail investors.

Blockchain technology can be used to encode the characteristics of an asset into a unit of digital value (token). This allows tokenized real estate to be broken up into many digital parts and attributes that traditionally require manual handling to be automated.

By digitally fractionalizing real estate, deep liquid markets can form on secondary trading platforms, resulting in significant reductions of both time and costs to transfer. And rather than having to own enough capital to buy an entire piece of real estate, investors can buy small fractions to gain portfolio exposure that is otherwise unattainable for most people.
We have signed a LOI for a $27M issuance for tokenized commercial real estate and secondary trading in Chicago. If you would like to view a demo please contact us.

industryData.name: Gaming
content: Virtual items and currencies within games have become extremely popular since the turn of the 21st century. But not without problems or limitations. Game developers, the original artists, are often cut out of the profits generated by the transfer of virtual items, while gamers are vulnerable to scams, centralized control of virtual assets, and other problems with trading on external secondary markets.

By putting virtual items on blockchain technology, fees can be embedded to guarantee ongoing revenue generation for game developers, counterfeits can be eliminated entirely, and gamers can have true ownership of assets - their accounts can never be closed and items never withdrawn.

The Chintai API can be used to embed trading and lending of virtual items directly into games. No need to expose gamers to external marketplaces or blockchain technology. Please contact us if you would like to discuss integration or have questions.

industryData.name: Demo Exchange
industryData.subtitle: Custom Token Distributions
content: Our high-performance exchange is open for viewing and usage. The Chintai order management and execution system can be white labeled by anyone who needs secondary trading and leasing of virtual assets. The front end can also be customized and branded appropriately to meet the UX and visual needs of a given use case or entity.

Our DEX will be based on this demo model. We’re currently in the process of applying for licensure from the Monetary Authority of Singapore. Facilitating non-custodial, peer-to-peer trading of utility tokens and tokenized securities is on our near term 2020 roadmap.
If you would like to set up an account to demo our exchange or learn more about our products please reach out to our team.

industryData.name: Demo Real Estate
industryData.subtitle: Custom Token Distributions
content: Our high-performance exchange and issuance engine are the underlying components for the “CinderBlox” real estate demo. Both can be white labeled for issuance and secondary trading of tokenized real estate.
As blockchain technology service providers, Chintai has built and will operate the underlying infrastructure for a $27M issuance of tokenized real estate in Chicago.

We can rapidly build and deploy custom front-end portals that are compliance enabled for anyone that has relevant legal and licensing established. Please contact us if you have questions or would like to setup a demo. You can also view the existing demo portal. If you would like an account for the existing demo please contact our team.

landingPagePentagon.title: Powering Pioneers Of The New Digital Economy
landingPagePentagon.problemText: People want to make predictable passive income on their crypto holdings, and have low-cost access to digital resources.
landingPagePentagon.solutionText: Chintai is a live marketplace that fulfills these desires by hosting a high-performance resource exchange for leasing tokenized assets for virtually any blockchain, and digital currency.
landingPagePentagon.chexTokenText: CHEX gives you access to the Chintai Markets. CHEX Smart Matching will automate maximum passive income returns for lenders, and secure resources at the best possible rates for borrowers.

leasingLandingAdvantages.title: Why Automate Resources?
leasingLandingAdvantages.text1: Successful applications offer seamless experiences for their users.
leasingLandingAdvantages.text2: Chintai removes annoying friction caused by EOS resource management.
leasingLandingAdvantages.text3: Users focus on enjoying your application. You focus on building.

leasingFAQ.q1: Does Chintai have access to your account?
leasingFAQ.q4: Why do I need Chintai when the 1.8 upgrade arrives?

leasingFAQ.q8: Where can I ask more questions?

leasingFAQ.answer2: Yes. The service is permissionless and you can cancel at any time.

leasingFAQ.answer41: With Chintai you get more. The 1.8 upgrade only services user accounts, requires owning EOS, does not automate RAM, and has no spam filter.

leasingFAQ.answer6: Yes. The service will automatically scale with the needs of your business.
leasingFAQ.answer7: All resources come from leasing markets to ensure you get the lowest price possible.
leasingFAQ.answer81: Our global team is available 24/7 to answer any questions. Please join our

en.leasingLandingSubTitle: Enabling you and your users to seamlessly transact on the EOS blockchain

leasingLandingContent.description1: CHEX is starting at 50% reduction in fees! CHEX provides the common pairing to enable Chintai to convert to access a world of hundreds of conceivably thousands of utility tokens paired to it for leasing in the future.
leasingLandingContent.description2: Our resource management system is middleware between the EOS blockchain and dApps. Any application can plug into Chintai, and automatically lease the required amount of resources for their contract AND their users. No manual management required after signing up.

leasingProcess.Text1: Without automated resource management, dApp’s and users are required to manage their own resources. This causes outages and a poor UX.
leasingProcess.Text2: Chintai removes the need to management EOS resources for dApps and users - Including automated management of CPU, NET, and RAM.
leasingProcess.Text3: Your users are happy. You have more time to focus on building. And your business has a key competitive advantage.

whatContent.title: What is Mynt?
whatContent.subTitle: Mynt is a turnkey service that harmonizes the technical, legal, and financial aspects of EOSIO token distributions.
whatContent.subTitleSmall: Launch your customized native token with reliable technology and trusted resources.

box1.title: Custom Token
box1.text: Our reputable development team builds your custom token with our proven and reliable technology. You deploy your entrepreneurial vision.

box2.title: Legal Resources
box2.text: Navigating regulatory uncertainty is daunting. We pair legal resources with a custom token that is compatible with your compliance needs.

box3.title: KYC/AML & Banking
box3.text: Know your customer and anti-money laundering laws are designed to prevent fraudulent use or transfer of funds. KYC/AML has been emphasized as an important consideration by global regulators, and establishing fiat banking.

box4.title: Custom Portal
box4.text: We build custom front end portals for all distribution types. Technology for KYC/AML fully integrated. Accept ETH, BTC, and EOS.

whyContent.title: Why Mynt?
whyContent.text1: Mynt is for entrepreneurs who want to save precious development hours, monetary resources and time searching for legal services.
whyContent.text2: We’ve designed Mynt to remove as much friction as possible so you can focus on innovating.

options.title: Customizable Options
options.point5: Customizable front-end auction portal with KYC integration

servicePackages.title: Service Packages
servicePackages.subTitle: Mynt ensures all technical components of a successful token distribution event are properly serviced. Our turnkey solution is battle-tested, customizable, secure, and reliable.

package2.title: GOLD
package2.subTitle: Suitable for users with basic skills

package3.title: PLATIMUM
package3.subTitle: Opens all the features of an advanced user

regulatory.title: Regulatory and Compliance
regulatory.subText1: Regulatory uncertainty is difficult to navigate.
regulatory.subText2: Our resources are on the front lines of blockchain technology and global compliance laws. They help you launch your token based on the latest suggestions from major financial institutions around the world.
regulatory.subText3: Mynt builds custom technology that is coherent with your legal needs.

kycBanking.title: Legal • KYC/AML • Banking
kycBanking.point1: KYC (know your customer) and AML (anti-money laundering) services with front-end portal integration.
kycBanking.point2: Accept BTC, ETH, EOS and major fiat currencies for your token distribution.
kycBanking.point3: Fiat Banking services for funds raised.
kycBanking.point4: General preliminary counsel for business concept
kycBanking.point5: White Paper or similar documentation content legal review
